Posts.Content: May 21, 2019 04:23PM Imdtm23 wrote: I had my surgery in December and just had a follow up with BS and MO and I asked this exact question. I will see BS every 6 months for the next couple years then every year. I will see MO every 3 to 6 months while I am on tamoxifen. She will do blood work, normal labs no markers. If I report any problems like bone pain or anything, she will send me for a scan or to another specialist. They do not do scans for BC like they do for other cancers. Her reason is that its too much radiation. I reported to her that I have been feeling a flutter near my heart and she is sending me to a Cardiologist Oncologist.
